name: @u4/opencv4nodejs
description: Asynchronous OpenCV 3.x / 4.x nodejs bindings with JavaScript and TypeScript API.

scripts.install_default: npm run build && node bin/install.js rebuild
scripts.install_macm1: npm run build  && node bin/install.js --version 4.5.4 --flag="-DCMAKE_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR=arm64 -DCMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES=arm64 -DWITH_FFMPEG=ON" rebuild
scripts.install_cuda: npm run build  && node bin/install.js --version 4.5.5 --flags="-DWITH_CUDA=ON -DWITH_CUDNN=ON -DOPENCV_DNN_CUDA=ON -DCUDA_FAST_MATH=ON -DWITH_FFMPEG=ON" rebuild
scripts.test: cd test && pnpm install && pnpm run test test
scripts.samples: cd examples && pnpm install && npm run build && node ./src/templateMatch/multiMatch.js && node ./src/applyColorMap.js && node ./src/asyncMatchFeatures.js && node ./src/faceDetect/asyncFaceDetection.js
scripts.do-build: npm run build  && node bin/install.js --flags="-DWITH_FFMPEG=ON" --jobs MAX build
scripts.do-rebuild: npm run build  && node bin/install.js --flags="-DWITH_FFMPEG=ON" --jobs MAX rebuild
scripts.build-debug: npm run build && BINDINGS_DEBUG=true node bin/install.js rebuild
